dcterms:creator: K. Alrashedy
D. Dharmaretnam
D. M. German
V. Srinivasan
T. Aaron Gulliver
dcterms:description: A dataset that collects 21 programming languages popular in the Stack Overflow community, based on the 2017 Stack Overflow developer survey, used for predicting the programming language of source code snippets.
dcterms:title: SC++

dcterms:creator: S. Fakhoury
V. Arnaoudova
C. Noiseux
F. Khomh
G. Antoniol
dcterms:description: A corpus that selects 4205 lines of source code from 13 Java open-source systems to classify code smells, containing over 1700 labeled code snippets.
dcterms:title: Code Smell Corpus

dcterms:creator: L. Pascarella
A. Bacchelli
dcterms:description: A corpus containing over 11,000 code reviews and 16 classes from six Java open-source software projects, used for classifying code comments.
dcterms:title: Code Comment Corpus

dcterms:creator: E. S. Maldonado
E. Shihab
N. Tsantalis
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of approximately 10,000 code comments collected from 10 open-source projects, classified into five types of self-admitted technical debt.
dcterms:title: Technical Debt Dataset
